[[Nargothrond]] | owner=[[Dwarves of Belegost]]
[[Túrin]] | type=Armour | appearance=Great all-gilded masks that were hideous to look upon | creator=[[Dwarves of the Blue Mountains]] | created=[[First Age]] | createdlocation=[[Belegost]] | destroyer= | destroyed= | destroyedlocation= | notablefor= | gallery=dwarf-masks }} '''Dwarf-masks''' were great gilded helmets made in the [[First Age]] by the [[Dwarves of the Blue Mountains]]. == History == The [[Dwarves of Belegost]] appeared within the [[Nirnaeth Arnoediad|Battle of Unnumbered Tears]] wearing masks they were resistant to fire, as according to their custom.{{S|Fifth}} The [[Elves of Nargothrond]] were in possession of dwarf-masks, as well as [[dwarf-mail]]; [[Túrin]] [[Mormegil]] found an all-gilded mask within the armories of [[Nargothrond]], which he wore before going to battle.{{CH|10}} At the [[Battle of Tumhalad]] the dwarf-mask protected him from [[Glaurung]].{{CH|11}} == Portrayal in adaptations == [[File:The Rings of Power (TV series) - Dwarf-mask.png|thumb|150px|left|''The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power'']] '''2022: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power]]'':''' :'''2 September: ''[[Adrift]]'':''' ::When [[Elrond]] enters [[Khazad-dûm]], the [[Dwarves|Dwarf Guards]] of the [[Doors of Durin|West-gate]] wear dwarf-masks. == See also == * [[Dragon-helm of Dor-lómin]] {{References}} [[Category:Armor]]
